title: Location is EVERYTHING! Stunning Cap Hill Penthouse
neighborhood: Groceries, Drinks, Food and More just steps away!
posting_body: ['Please note that advertised rate reflects two months free amortized on an 18 month lease; base rate is $6500.', 'Two months free special is valid on 18-24 month leases; a one month free special is available for 10-12 month leases.', 'Household must move in within 30 days.', 'See office for details.', 'NOW TAKING TOURS', 'This top floor home is located on the west side of the building, with views only obstructed during the summer from the trees that line the street below.', "Enter to find a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, shaker-style cabinetry with a butler's pantry, and tile floors to the right.", 'Straight ahead lies the living/dining room, outfitted with plank floors and a fireplace.', 'Surrounding the living room and wrapping around two sides of the apartment is the 1000 square foot patio, where the Space Needle, Elliot Bay, and Seattle’s cityscape greets you.', 'The oversize master suite offers double undermounted sinks and a walk-in closet, and both bedrooms offer phenomenal views of the city.', 'Located on a tree-lined street, Broadway Market Residences is a small community in the heart of North Capitol Hill.', 'Tasty eateries like Witness, Americana, and BOCA are all within walking distance, as well as plenty of local small businesses like Buckhorn Barber Shop and Spin Cycle.', 'And when you’re ready for a fun night out, Herb and Bitter Public House and Julia’s are ready and welcoming.', 'Features & Amenities', '▸Tile fireplace', '▸Ample storage in closets, cabinets, and laundry room', '▸Subway tile kitchen backsplash', '▸Quartz counters', '▸Wrap-around 1000 square foot patio', '▸Views of the Seattle skyline, Space Needle, and Elliot Bay', '▸Controlled access, non-smoking building', '▸Easy access to QFC, light rail, and green spaces like Volunteer and Cal Anderson Parks', 'Have questions?', 'Ready to tour?', '📱 Text or call us directly at', 'show contact info', '💻', 'Book online at', '<URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Offered by Blanton Turner', 'Tags: Harrison, Thomas, John, Republican, Mercer, Roy, Boylston, Belmont, Bellevue, QFC, Witness, Boca, La Cocina, Amazon, Microsoft, Nordstrom, Weyerhaeuser, Zillow, Expedia, Link Light Rail, Streetcar, Seattle Central College, Community College, University of Washington, UW, Seattle University, SU, Whole Foods']
